StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetO.cerDropView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OSS int = NULL AS
SELECT P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, OCS.OCS_ID, P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS PERSON_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN, DIST.SHORT_NAME AS DISTRICT, MC.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER, --CONVERT(CHAR(6), OCS.SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE, 12) AS SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE, OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE AS TRAINING_TYPE, OC.CLASS_NUMBER AS CLASS_INCREMENT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), OCS.CLASS_RESULT_DATE, 106) AS RESULT_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(6), OCS.REPORT_DATE, 12), SPACE(0)) AS REPORT_DATE, --OCS.COMPANY, --OCS.PLATOON, COALESCE(OCR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS TRAINING_RESULT, OCS.DROP_REASON AS DROP_CODE, ODR.DROP_REASON_DESCRIPTION AS DROP_REASON, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), OCS.TRAINING_DROP_WEEK), SPACE(0)) AS TRAINING_DROP_WEEK, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.SHORT_NAME AS ORGANIZATION_NAME, RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION DIST INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP RS_M ON (DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID = RS_M.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OSS_M ON (RS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OSS_M.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON (N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @OSS) INNER JOIN OCS ON (N.NWA_ID = OCS.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN OCS_CLASS OC ON (OCS.OCS_ID = dbo.GetMaxOCSID(OCS.NWA_ID, 'Y') AND OCS.OCS_CLASS_ID = OC.CLASS_ID AND OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE != 'OCC' AND OCS.SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) --INNER JOIN NWA N ON -- (OCS.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND -- N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @OSS) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON P.PERSON_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE AND SD.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('AQ','AR','BD','BC')) LEFT OUTER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT C ON OCS.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OCS_DROP_REASON ODR ON OCS.DROP_REASON = ODR.DROP_REASON_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN OCS_CLASS_RESULT OCR ON OCS.CLASS_RESULT_CODE = OCR.RESULT_CODE
